verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'll pull my collar closer,
For the night is gettin' cold.
First light drawin' nearer,
As this story's told.
I thought this would be shorter,
But I'm still sittin' here.
Brothers are milling around me,
And I hear their call so clear.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Turn the lamps up brighter,
Trim the wicks to see,
Turn the darkness lighter,
So that He can see me.
Illuminate the footpath,
That He is walkin' on,
And join in this procession,
That's gonna lead into the dawn.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So we turned our flames up higher,
And the oil began to flow,
But some commenced to sputter,
And others wouldn't glow.
Shouts went up around me,
'Lend me some lamp oil,
My bown is dry and my flask is done.'
And I hear that call again.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The crowd began to thin,
As we went out to Him.
Some had to go to town for oil,
Their lamps were far too dim.
As sorry as I was to see them
Leavin' at this hour,
I couldn't lend my oil out 'cause
I needed all my fire.
